page.title: 02Living in Woburn.
page.content: Our names are Lisa and Richard Smith and we live in Woburn.We enjoy living in Woburn because there is a swimming pool at the other end of the village. Our father works at Speedwell Farm just up the road from where we live. The farm is quite large. In the Summer we help with the harvest. From our house we can see Woburn Abbey and in the distance you can see the deer in the park. Our garden is quite large with a cooking apple tree at the bottom. There is not a lot of industry in Woburn, but behind the post office there is the Drakeloe Press and by the recreation ground there is A.B. Engineering. The town hall is falling down so some residents have formed a committee to build a new one. They hope to finish it in 1986.
